PerfectNetExp.abs: 2.在罗马教廷与中国大陆恢复正常的外交关系之后,依照世界各主权国家的惯例,在中国中央政府与罗马教廷之间正式签署政教协定(Concordat),规范罗马公教会在主教任命权.
哥伦比亚与教皇有个契约(concordat)。这种契约concordat是特指与教皇的协约。希特勒有契约,墨索里尼有契约,佛朗哥有契约。他们(罗马教廷)想在这里建立一个契约,那就是.
concessionary rate 优惠率concordat 协定；契约；国际监管条约condition 条件

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from French, or from Latin concordatum 'something agreed upon', neuter past participle of concordare 'be of one mind' (see concord)

means.word_mean: 1. a signed written agreement between two or more parties (nations) to perform some action

auth_sentence.content: The arrangement, known as the Concordat, lasted a century.

auth_sentence.content: Martin Luther was a huge influence on his anti-semetic lust.... and the Vatican kowtowed with their shameful COncordat.

auth_sentence.content: It is now undoubtedly farewell to the concordat, occasionally billed as historic, between Ministers and Cosla.
